name: Timmy's Very Bad School Day
description:
One strange day, Timmy showed up to school to find everybody—and every*thing*—inexplicably irritated and ready to unleash their rage at the world. And that... made Timmy *angry*. 

**Controls!**  

Move: Arrow keys / WASD

Select: Z

Get ANGRY: X

**Our Team!**  

LunacyEcho - Music Czar, additional story

arch - Story Czar, additional coding  

johnfn - Overworld Czar, additional coding

fawnblue - Battle Czar, additional art

Miyolophone - Art Czar, additional parents

**Changelog**

- Fixed various ending bugs that crashed the game

- Fixes for invisible menus, some enemies and interactables not respawning as intended, etc 
- 10/6: Fixed issue where you can win fights by dying, fixed two game crashes
